alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Massac; Pope (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 12:41PM CDT until July 18 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Massac County in southern Illinois... Pope County in southern Illinois... Eastern Johnson County in southern Illinois... Western Livingston County in western Kentucky... Carlisle County in western Kentucky... Southeastern Ballard County in western Kentucky... McCracken County in western Kentucky... Northwestern Graves County in western Kentucky... * Until 145 PM CDT. * At 1240 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles east of Cobden to 6 miles east of Tamms to Cairo to near Anniston, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Paducah, Metropolis, Bardwell, Reidland, Lone Oak, Brookport, Golconda, Barkley Regional Airport, Dixon Springs, Ledbetter, West Paducah, Lovelaceville, New Columbia, Kevil, Joppa, New Burnside, Eddyville, Simpson, Lowes and Hamletsburg. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
